name: Necromantic Comedy
description:
01. Cadaver
02. Double Barrel Constipation
03. Fatal Fondue
04. The Backwoods Naval Slicer
05. Utopia
06. Pleasure and Suffering
07. Dystopia
08. Eternal Sadness

The first Perverse Imagery full-length! 8 tracks or brutal southern goresludge! Guaranteed the most original music you're heard come out of anything death metal.

Free shipping to all US customers. $2.50 international $1.00 with another order. 

Limited to 200 copies.

NOTE: This is still in the writing process, I go to record this in the summer of 2012 and it should be out by late 2012!
